entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
